blogTitle: What is Context API and Purpose?
description: Context API create a simple and more easier method for prop-drilling. It help to passing unique data from all level in our application. It can also support parent or upper stage data changes. Context provide a way to pass data all components tree without all level props data passing. It can support children stage to parent stage data passing. Context create more easy and useful feature to create our Moran applications.

A semantic element and tag explain clearly about developer adn browser. Example of Semantic tag are <article>, <header>, <footer>, <main> and others. Such as non semantic tag are <div>, <span>. Semantic element helps to create SEO friendly application. Semantic element follow some rule to set content. Where no rule follow the non semantic.

A block element has some whitespace above and below. Block element care about any side element. Block element contain full width of browser space for every single block element. Block elements are :

-

and others. An inline-block element is placed its content size. inline-block element keep right side position to set another inline and inline-block element. Inline-block element wrap as a whole.
